edu.wit.dcsn.comp1050.lab02

Class GradeExams

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.wit.dcsn.comp1050.lab02.GradeExams

  • public final class GradeExams
extends java.lang.Object
    Version:
    1.0.0 2018-02-13 Create a class to grade student responses to a multiple choice test. The answer key will be provided as a single-dimensional array of char, where each array element corresponds with a question on the exam. Students' answers will be provided as a multi(two)-dimensional array of char where the outer array represents a student and the inner array represents that student's answers, corresponding to the answer key.

    Mark an answer correct if the corresponding element of the answer key matches.

    The methods are package visible to enable your ExamGrader to access them.

    Author:
    Hunter Wintle

      • gradeAllExams

        static void gradeAllExams(char[] answerKey,
                          char[][] allStudentsAnswers)
        Utility method to grade all exams and display summary statistics
        Parameters:
        answerKey - the set of correct answers
        allStudentsAnswers - the answers for all of the students

      • gradeAnExam

        static boolean gradeAnExam(int studentId,
                           char[] answerKey,
                           char[] studentAnswers,
                           int[] correctAnswerCount)
        Utility method to grade a single exam
        Parameters:
        studentId - the student's identification number
        answerKey - the set of correct answers
        studentAnswers - the student's answers
        correctAnswerCount - counters for each question to track number of times answered correctly
        Returns:
        true indicates that we were able to grade the exam; false means the number of questions according to the answer key does not match the number of questions answered by the student - does not reflect whether the student 'passed'

      • reportStatistics

        static void reportStatistics(int[] correctAnswersCount,
                             int studentCount,
                             int gradedExamCount)
        Utility method to display the statistics for an exam
        Parameters:
        correctAnswersCount - number of correct responses per question
        studentCount - number of students that took the exam
        gradedExamCount - number of exams that were actually graded
